segment.tokens: why the Workers did not let her out
that Queen Mothers do not get along well with young Queens
The Workers talked it over by themselves
the poor young Queen shut up in her cell
how you can stand it to hear her piping so pitifully all the time
I never saw a finer tongue than the one she runs out for honey "
a sensible old Worker had seen
many Queens hatched many swarms fly away
you 'd be a good deal more
if we did let her out now
It would not do at all "
The tender-hearted Worker did not answer this
she talked it over with the Drones
" " wiping her eyes with her forefeet " I can hardly gather a mouthful of honey thinking of her "
you ought to be doing something
if you can not gather honey
This was just like a Drone
he could not bear to see
The Worker did not hang herself up
She never did that except on cloudy days
she was of those Bees who seem to think that nothing will come out right unless they stop working to see about it
that nothing will come out right
she was too anxious to do it
since her friends were only minding the law
that it was to keep the new Queen in her cell
She could not think of her work
half the time she did not know
whether she was laying a Drone egg a Worker egg
of that she did not make any mistake
she put one into the wrong kind of cell
I can not stay here with a young Queen
I will take my friends with me "
she struck her feelers on those of her friend
exactly how she felt about it
In this way the news was passed around
soon many of the Workers were as as their Queen Mother
They were so over it at times
that the air of the hive grew very hot
After a while they would become quiet
They whispered often to each other
" The guides are looking for a good place now "
that she has not left the hive
since she began to lay eggs
I am not allowed to rule in my own hive
The Workers are guarding the royal cells
I will not stay any longer "
as though he had thought of it for the first time
" Then why do n't you go away "
Besides somebody must stay here to take care of the Workers the young Queen "
" " he would have gone anywhere with me "
And " Now just like a Queen Mother
She has known all the time
that she would have to leave yet here
making the biggest kind of fuss about it
for everything is done law in the hive
no one person should find fault
The law looks after them all
any one have more than his rightful share
That same afternoon there was a sudden in their home
The Workers who had been outside returned with the rest
a few came to the door of the hive
a few struck their wings together
a few gave the signal for starting
all were going with the Queen Mother
Then all hurried of the door
all flew with her in circles overhead
We are going far far away
we shall not tell you where
It is a lovely a very lovely place "
